When connected to the limelight, make sure to switch your pipeline type to apriltags in the input tab. Switch over to the advanced tab, and turn on full 3d targeting. In there, you should see a button to allow you to upload the map file I linked earlier. The field will still show the graphics from the previous year, but the april tags will be in the correct location:

image1053×904 60.2 KB

The field will still show the graphics from the previous year

It is not that important but at what point will the graphics be updated? In the next version release?

Introducing Limelight 4

We will have more performance comparisons and data to show before taking orders when we release Limelight OS 2025.0 on the 15th.
